entry.title: dotnet/diagnostics - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-08-23
entry.content:
Issues

Updated

  • Add docs to better describe the .NET diagnostic experience #515
    documentation, dotnet-trace, diagnostic global tooling, dotnet-counters, dotnet-dump, dotnet-sos, priority:1, User Story, Bottom Up Work, 7.0.0
  • Improve .NET diagnostics CLI tooling and libraries #1794
    dotnet-trace, diagnostic global tooling, dotnet-counters, dotnet-monitor, dotnet-stack, User Story, Bottom Up Work, Future

PullRequests

Updated

  • Initial trace event trigger implementation and tests. #2508
  • Add new 'symbolicate' commands to dotnet-stack #2436
    enhancement, diagnostic global tooling, dotnet-stack, 6.0.0
  • [main] Update dependencies from dotnet/installer #2193
  • [main] Update dependencies from dotnet/arcade #2292
